Special Reports
Special reports of progress shall be submitted upon request by the
Office of Education.
Final Reports
A final report shall be submitted not later than three months follow¬
ing the termination date of the project. The grantee shall provide the
U. S. Office of Education 100 copies of the final report and 100 copies
of any publications resulting from or primarily related to the research.
In addition to the final written report, the grantee may in some instances
wish to submit a report in one copy utilizing one of the new media.
Acknowledgment of Federal Support
Any publication resulting from or primarily related to research sup¬
ported by an Office of Education grant shall contain the following acknow¬
ledgment:
The research reported herein was supported by a grant from
the United States Office of Education, Department of Health,
Education, and Welfare*
